questions.question_text: Which is an objective of the 'managing a stage boundary' process?

discussion.content:
B is correct; he other options are not the primary objective of this process:

A. To manage risks and issues that may impact the current stage: This is an ongoing activity throughout the project, not just at stage boundaries.
C. To define how and when all the project's products will be delivered and at what cost: This is done during the "initiating a project" and "planning" processes.
D. To control the delivery of the project's products: This is the focus of the "managing product delivery" process.
